note.p: Belgian botanist. Secretary of the Royal Society of Botany of Belgium, 1866. Director of the State Botanic Garden in Brussels, 1876–1901. Worked on the taxonomy of roses, plant geography, and palaeobotany.
Annuaire de l’Académie royale des sciences, des lettres et des beaux-arts de Belgique 72 (1906): 83–190.
